SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActiveActor
Represents an active, drawable actor in the game.
ActiveActorDestructible
Represents an actor in the game that is both active and destructible.
ActorManager
Manages the lifecycle of all actors in the game, including friendly units, enemies, projectiles, and power-ups.
AudioControlPanel
 
AudioSettingsPage
The AudioSettingsPage class handles the display and functionality of the audio settings overlay, allowing users to mute/unmute background music and sound effects.
BasicFighterPlane
Represents a basic enemy fighter plane in the game.
BasicFighterPlaneFactory
Factory class for creating instances of BasicFighterPlane.
BossPlane
Represents the boss enemy in the game.
BossProjectile
Represents a projectile fired by the boss enemy in the game.
CollisionManager
Manages collision detection and handling between various game objects.
Controller
Controls the game's flow by managing transitions between levels and handling property change events.
CountdownOverlay
Displays a countdown overlay (3-2-1-GO) before the game starts.
Destructible
Represents an entity in the game that can take damage and be destroyed.
EnemyManager
Manages enemy-related functionalities, such as spawning, firing projectiles, and keeping track of active enemies.
EnemyPlane
Represents an enemy plane in the game.
EnemyProjectile
Represents a projectile fired by enemy planes in the game.
EventHandler
Handles events related to winning and losing the game.
FighterPlane
Represents a fighter plane in the game that can take damage and fire projectiles.
FighterPlaneFactory
Interface for factories that create instances of FighterPlane.
GameLoopManager
Manages the game loop using a Timeline.
GameOverScreen
Represents the "Game Over" screen displayed when the player loses the game.
GameStateManager
Manages the state of the game and notifies listeners of state changes.
GameStateManager.GameState
Enum representing possible game states.
HealthBar
Represents a health bar that visually displays the health status of an entity in the game.
HeartDisplay
Represents a visual display of hearts used to indicate the player's health.
InputManager
Manages user input for controlling the game.
InstructionsPage
The InstructionsPage class is responsible for displaying an instructions overlay that guides users on how to play the game and includes control settings.
KillCountDisplay
Represents a display for tracking and showing the player's current kill count.
LevelOne
Represents the first level of the game.
LevelParent
Represents the base class for all levels in the game.
LevelThree
Represents the third level of the game.
LevelTwo
Represents the second level of the game.
LevelView
Represents the base visual setup for a game level.
LevelViewLevelTwo
Represents the visual setup for Level Two in the game.
Main
The entry point of the Sky Battle game.
MenuView
 
PauseManager
Manages the game's pause functionality, including pausing, resuming, restarting, and returning to the main menu.
PauseScreen
Represents the pause screen overlay displayed when the game is paused.
PowerUp
Represents a power-up in the game.
Projectile
Abstract base class for all types of projectiles in the game.
ProjectileFactory
Factory class for creating projectiles based on their type.
ProjectileFactory.ProjectileType
Enumeration of projectile types.
SceneManager
Manages the configuration and display of the game's main scene.
ShieldImage
Represents a visual shield effect in the game.
SoundManager
Manages background music and sound effects for the game.
SpreadshotPowerUp
Represents a spreadshot power-up in the game.
UserPlane
Represents the user-controlled fighter plane in the game.
UserProjectile
Represents a projectile fired by the player's plane in the game.
WinScreen
Represents the "You Win" screen displayed when the player completes the game.
